pages.title: Owl's Eyes Drops
pages.text1: Owl's Eyes Drops gives you an ability to feel the presence of all living entities around.
pages.text3: Effects: highlights all living entities in big area.

pages.title: Thorny plants
pages.text: You can use cactus,any Untouched Nature cactus,arizona thistle and thistle,feverweed,briar branch and briars,witch thorns.

pages.title: Seed
pages.text: You can use wheat,pumpkin,melon and beetroot seeds and seeds from Untouched Nature.
